BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

TopicRulePayload.Description: Save raw vss data in JSON format to S3 bucket.
Send payload to Kinesis Firehose stream for processing.

DatabaseInput.Description: This database holds reference table(s) for Kinesis Firehose
DatabaseInput.Name: iot-data-conversion-glue-database

TableInput.Description: Main data stream for IoT Core reference table
TableInput.Name: iot-main-stream-glue-schema-table

Properties.Description: CMS Connect and Store AWS Glue Registry Name
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/glue-registry/name

Properties.Description: CMS Connect and Store AWS Glue Schema Arn
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/glue-schema/arn

Properties.Description: The Glue database in which the telemetry table is stored.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/glue-database/name

Properties.Description: The Glue data catalog in which the table is to be created.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/glue-data-catalog/name

Properties.Description: The Glue table which references to the stored telemetry data.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/glue-table/name

Properties.Description: The ARN of the S3 bucket in which the telemetry data is stored.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/s3-storage-bucket/arn

Properties.Description: The ARN of the encryption key for the S3 bucket in which the telemetry data is stored.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/s3-storage-bucket/key-arn

Properties.Description: The name of the S3 bucket in which the telemetry data is stored.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/s3-storage-bucket/name

Properties.Description: The region of the S3 bucket in which the telemetry data is stored.
Properties.Name: /dev/cms/telemetry/s3-storage-bucket/region

Properties.Description: JSON schema for vehicle signal specification data. Vin is required for partitioning.
Properties.Name: cms-connect-store-on-aws-stack-dev-glue-schema

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
